Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver<IBallCmd>

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObserver<IBallCmd>
    This is a concrete ball class.

      • update

        public void update(IDispatcher<IBallCmd> o,
                   IBallCmd cmd)
        This method is called by the ballModel Dispatcher to notify all the balls to perform the given command. The given command is executed.
        Specified by:
        update in interface IObserver<IBallCmd>
        Parameters:
        o - the Dispatcher that sent the update request
        cmd - the IBallCmd that will be run
